data.lyric:
[ti:No Auto(feat. Lil Durk) (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Uzi Vert/Lil Durk]
[al:Eternal Atake (Deluxe) - LUV vs. The World 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]No Auto(feat. Lil Durk) (Explicit) - Lil Uzi Vert/Lil Durk
[00:02.80]Lil Uzi Vert：
[00:03.66]DY Krazy
[00:06.24]D**n Wond3r you made this
[00:07.74]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[00:09.52]Oh you p***y
[00:10.36]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[00:12.65]Lil Durk：
[00:13.05]Aye DY this like a Wayne beat
[00:15.68]Gotta watch that side block hit up that Main Street
[00:18.50]You can't beef while we on tour lil' n***a you can't eat
[00:21.53]They killed your mans now you be claimin' that you can't sleep
[00:24.47]That trigger finger fast like Floyd but punch like AB
[00:27.54]He use tune and dyed his dreads that p***y ain't me
[00:30.45]Yeah that Glock go bang but it ain't Keef
[00:33.79]He got shot and made a statement man he ain't street
[00:36.65]You ain't never shot s**t put that gun down
[00:39.67]You ain't wake up out your sleep to no gun sounds
[00:42.60]Your OG entertain your gossip look at your son now yeah
[00:46.46]Too many pills give me chills yeah
[00:49.40]Just 'cause you family ain't no deals yeah
[00:51.82]She used to punch in fights and come to the A and give me head
[00:55.14]I told her bring the pounds before she come she say she scared
[00:58.05]Ain't tell her 'bout no county s**t get caught she goin' fed
[01:00.94]Lil Uzi Vert：
[01:01.83]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[01:04.05]Wow yeah
[01:04.72]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[01:06.91]Lil Uzi Vert：
[01:07.62]He end up dead huh 'Cause he a rookie
[01:10.65]We make bread yeah off the bookies
[01:13.70]Did a drive by in a range G
[01:15.90]Pull up on an opp's block in the same week
[01:19.00]Boy you broke and you f**kin' on the same freak
[01:21.83]They saw me go from broke to rich that's why they angry
[01:24.94]I be runnin' this rap s**t in the same cleats
[01:27.75]I'll knock a n***a down like I'm the same size as Dave East
[01:31.26]Oh oh you lit huh Oh you turned huh
[01:34.84]That thotiana you f**k with she got you burnt huh
[01:37.55]Ew
[01:37.80]I'm off a Perc huh drinking lean gotta burp huh
[01:40.48]Woah
[01:40.93]Oh you geeked up
[01:42.45]That's your turn nine times out of ten she tryna set you up
[01:46.10]Cut the sprinklers on before them boys try to wet you up
[01:48.99]My homie only 24 he got a Bentley truck
[01:51.80]Lil Uzi Vert：
[01:52.91]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[01:55.97]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[01:59.08]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[02:01.88]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[02:04.94]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
[02:07.54]Can you move those ones over a little bit
[02:09.18]Like they're goin' kinda fast
[02:10.71]Oh you scared huh Oh you p***y
data.trans:
[ti:No Auto(feat. Lil Durk) (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Uzi Vert/Lil Durk]
[al:Eternal Atake (Deluxe) - LUV vs. The World 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.80]//
[00:03.66]DY Krazy制作
[00:06.24]KidWond3r制作
[00:07.74]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[00:09.52]你个孬种
[00:10.36]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[00:12.65]//
[00:13.05]DY 这就像是Lil Wayne的歌
[00:15.68]必须小心那些小街小巷 走上那条宽敞街道
[00:18.50]我们很忙的时候 你就别来打扰我们 小老弟 你成不了事儿的
[00:21.53]他们杀了你的人 现在你说你睡不着觉
[00:24.47]扣动扳机的速度快得就像Floyd Mayweather 拳头就像Adrien Broner一样硬
[00:27.54]他用软件做音乐 头发染成五颜六色 那个孬种不是我
[00:30.45]格洛克砰砰响 但我不是Chief Keef
[00:33.79]他被枪击 发了声明 朋友 他没有街头风范
[00:36.65]你从来没有开过枪 把枪放下吧
[00:39.67]你从来没有醒来就听到枪声四起
[00:42.60]你的前辈喜欢你的那些小道传闻 现在看看你的孩子
[00:46.46]太多那种东西 让我很快乐
[00:49.40]仅仅是因为你的家庭关系 根本就没有意义
[00:51.82]她曾经搭乘飞机来到亚特兰大 专程来伺候我
[00:55.14]我叫她来之前带点好东西来 她说她怕了
[00:58.05]没有跟她说任何秘密 要是她被抓了 她肯定会告密
[01:00.94]//
[01:01.83]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[01:04.05]//
[01:04.72]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[01:06.91]//
[01:07.62]他最后死翘翘了吗 因为他是个菜鸟
[01:10.65]我们赌上性命 挣到很多钱
[01:13.70]开着豪车 来一场飞车射击
[01:15.90]就在那一周 开着车来到敌人的地盘
[01:19.00]小子 你好穷 你只有那一个女人
[01:21.83]他们看我从穷小子变成大富翁 所以心里很愤怒
[01:24.94]我现在已经在说唱行业混得风生水起
[01:27.75]我会消灭那些家伙 好像我是Dave East那样的大块头
[01:31.26]你很厉害吗 你很了不起吗
[01:34.84]你勾搭的那个小妞让你痛不欲生吗
[01:37.55]//
[01:37.80]我吃了那种东西 喝了特制饮料 兴奋得不行
[01:40.48]//
[01:40.93]你很疯狂吗
[01:42.45]到你了 十有八九她是在耍你
[01:46.10]在我的兄弟来教训你之前 赶紧做好准备吧
[01:48.99]我的好兄弟才二十四岁 他已经有一辆宾利
[01:51.80]//
[01:52.91]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[01:55.97]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[01:59.08]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[02:01.88]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[02:04.94]你怕了吗 你个孬种
[02:07.54]你能不能把这些东西拿开点
[02:09.18]他们好像速度有点快
[02:10.71]你怕了吗 你个孬种
